title: Why do YOU play normals?
body: For me its just the damn long queue wait time in ranked

replies.body: When I don't give a shit about having to win.
I want to try hard after the first 3 games.
for me its the trash teamates and the frustration of ranked, then ppl say chil its norm and i proceed to stop helping them (or if they are enemy focus them)

try yasuo hes my key to carrying trash,
I also afk if i feel they dont deserve the carry.

i dont want to have to carry trash, thats the thing tho, i actually have more skilled allies in norms, than in ranked, i want competent allies, onslaught has helped with that a lot, i feel like for once, i have a TEAM

for me norms has always been complete aspies and I would try lots of champs but couldnt get a 100% winrate.
I basically have a 100% winrate with yasuo except for a game i afked, a game we had 2 players v 5 , and then one where bot gave jinx like 10 kills by 10 minutes.

To git gud and not be a sterotypical girl maining support in ranked. 

To have fun, though that ain't always happening since enemies after pick cancer in normals.
Usually everybody plays it to try out new champions ETC.
To take a break from the try-hard and induce chaos
